name: Jobs4You
desc: Jobs4You is a platform to streamline the job application process for both applicant and recruiter.

name: Retail-Revolutionizer
desc: Retail Revolutionizer is a web application designed to address the challenges faced by shopkeepers in managing products in their shops.

name: Netflix Frontend Clone
desc: A popular video stremaing platform's frontend clone based as a static front page of the platform.

name: TalkSphere
desc: TalkSphere is a real-time audio chat application built using WebRTC technology, designed for seamless, low-latency communication between users.

name: Taskify
desc: Taskify is an application that allows bug tracking, issue tracking and agile project management for the users.
